web_snippets: MIKE HANNA ... Mike, the visionary founder of TrueSpot, is a wireless industry pioneer and accomplished leader with a remarkable career spanning multiple startups ...
Mike Hanna's recognition is a testament to the game-changing work he and the TrueSpot team are doing. Founded in 2017, TrueSpot is a pioneer in Real-Time ...
Mike is the CEO and Founder of TrueSpot. Mike, thanks so much for joining. Mike Hanna: My pleasure. Great to be here. Thanks, Greg.
